review.title: “Sales/Marketing Executive.”
review.pros: Pros – Proven ability to balance strategic thinking with focus on day-to-day work. Effective at working independently with a strong sense of when/how to seek counsel from other business partners to ensure alignment and positive impact.
review.cons: Cons – Capable to manage all parties outstanding and good controlling of all types, reporting, reply to every statement with true confident.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Truly, I want to make my bright and good carrier as a Sales Professional with great administrative organization.
